name: Venice Consulting Group
description:
The Venice Consulting Group is a web + mobile application development company focused on UX - the user's experience. The firm's core competency lies in specialized custom application development. It applies the latest proven technologies to meet our clients'​ objectives of building world-class internet sites & mobile applications.
 
CLIENTS INCLUDE: American Express with Solver, Bio-Rad Labs, California Endowment, FOX Sports, Houlihan Lokey, Insperity, Lexus, On Assignment, Pontiac, Rethink BH, Volkswagen & SAG-AFTRA.
 
For more, please see http://www.veniceconsulting.com/.
